name: Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter LV Single Phase (LXP5K)
description:
Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter has a newly designed solar and energy storage solution. The best off grid inverter, capable to install in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems. 

LXP Hybrid enables a programmable and scheduled smart solar energy storage system to help increase your solar energy self-consumption rate, protect your home appliances from grid shortage, and balance your energy usage strategy to save energy bill.

Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter Description

Solar Input• Maximum DC Input Power: 8000W• Nominal DC Input Voltage: 360VDC• DC Input Voltage Range: 100VDC-550VDC• MPPT Voltage Range: 120VDC-500VDC• Start Voltage: 140VDC• Number of MPP Trackers: 2• Maximum DC Input Current: 12.5A / 12.5A

Battery Input / Output• Compatible Battery Type: Lithium-ion / Lead-Acid• Nominal Battery Voltage: 48VDC• Battery Voltage Range: 40VDC – 60VDC• Maximum Charge / Discharge Current: 80A / 80A• Maximum Charge / Discharge Power: 5000W / 5000W• Charging Curve: 3 Stages

AC Input / Output• Nominal AC Output Power: 5000W• Nominal AC Output Current: 25A• Nominal AC Voltage: 230VAC (180VAC-270VAC)• Nominal AC Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz (45Hz-55Hz / 55Hz-65Hz)• Power Factor: >0.99 @ Rated Power 0.8 Lagging – 0.8 Leading Adjustable

Environment Limit• Ingress Protection: IP65• Relative Humidity: 0% to 100%• Operating Temperature Range: -25°C to +60°C• Operating Altitude: <2000m• Communication: RS485 / WIFI / CAN

name: LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid Inverter
description:
The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid inverter supports several working modes, including Pure off-grid working mode: working as traditional off-grid inverters, can prioritize between using AC power or solar power. Hybrid working mode: working as a hybrid, supporting solar and utility jointly taking the load can choose between self- consumption mode or change priority mode.

With thousands of hybrid inverters & AC units installed around the world,Luxpower has stepped even further to bring power to every home, with or without grid power.

LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid series off grid inverters can support the system to work as back-up power or a replacement for diesel generator. Since the inverter support paralleling function. The capacity of the system can range from 3kW to 50kW.

Reclaim Your Power


Off grid seamless switching

Wide PV input voltage range

Great battery compatibility

Single Phase / Unbalanced 3-Phase

Support up to 16pcs in parallel.

Separate generator port available

Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes
short_description: The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid inverter supports several working modes, including Pure off-grid working mode: working as traditional off-grid inverters, can prioritize between using AC power or solar power. Hybrid working mode: working as a hybrid, supporting solar and utility jointly taking the load can choose between self- consumption mode or change priority mode.

name: Lux Power: Inverter 10KW Hybrid LV Single Phase (LXP10K)
description:
Luxpower 10kW Hybrid Inverter, model LXP10K is ready to take your solar system to the next level. The Luxpower 10Kw Hybrid Inverter is an inverter for solar panels an inverter for solar power. This solar inverter with battery and solar panels converts the DC electricity generated by your solar panels into AC electricity. It has the ability to connect with solar panels and store energy in the lithium ion battery.

Description

Battery Parameters• Compatible Battery Type: Lead-acid / Lithium• Nominal Battery Voltage: 48VDC• Battery Voltage Range: 40VDC-60VDC• Maximum Charge / Discharge Current: 210A• Maximum Charge / Discharge Power: 10 000W

DC PV Input• Max DC Input for Single MPPT: 12 000W / 7 000W / 7 000W• Maximum PV Input: 16 000W• DC Input Voltage Range: 100VDC-600VDC• Nominal DC Input Voltage: 360VDC• Full Power MPPT Voltage Range: 210VDC-500VDC• Maximum DC Input Current: 25A / 15A / 15A• MPPT Number / Strings per MPPT: 3(2/1/1)

AC Output (Grid)• Nominal Power: 10 000W• Nominal AC Voltage: 240VAC• Operating Voltage Range: 180VAC-270VAC• Maximum Continuous AC Current: 41.6A @ 240VAC• Nominal AC Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz

UPS Output (With Battery)• UPS Max Output Power: 10 000W• UPS Nominal Output Voltage: 240VAC• UPS Nominal Output Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz• UPS Nominal Output Current: 41.6A @ 240VAC• Peak Power: 14Kw 10Min / 16Kw 5 Min / 20Kw 500ms• Switching Time: <20ms

Environment Limit• Ingress Protection: IP65• Operating Temperature Range: -25°C to +60°C• Cooling: Fan• Communication: RS485 / WIFI / CAN
short_description: Luxpower 10kW Hybrid Inverter, model LXP10K is ready to take your solar system to the next level. The Luxpower 10Kw Hybrid Inverter is an inverter for solar panels an inverter for solar power.

name: LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 (LXP-SNA5000)
description:
The\xa0LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Off-Grid Inverter is a battery inverter that provides you with a variety of ways to power your household devices.



LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Description 




Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes



PV & AC power loads simultaneously



Wide PV input voltage range



Easy to use with battery



Free monitoring & remote upgrade



Single phase or unbalanced three phase



Advanced Parallel, up to 50kW



Separate generator interface available



Host inverter automatically generated tomanage entire system
short_description: LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 has the ability to power from PV & AC power loads simultaneously. Luxpower comes with Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes.

name: LuxPower 6Kw Eco Beast All-In-One
description:
LuxPower 6Kw Eco Beast All-In-One 6kw/10kWh



Description 



The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Beast All-In-One is an advanced solution designed to provide users with an efficient and reliable power management experience. Moreover, it offers seamless integration and user-friendly features, ensuring optimal performance and ease of use.



The LuxPower Eco Beast All-In-One, with its self-developed monitoring system, is the smart and efficient energy usage and storage enabler. Moreover, it integrates seamlessly to optimize performance and reliability.



Whether on-site or remote, you can enjoy real-time, close-loop communication with your LuxPower Eco Beast. Additionally, monitor station performance around the clock, fine-tune specific modules, and streamline energy flow—all within a single platform. This ensures comprehensive oversight and optimal efficiency at all times.



The 6kW Inverter (SNA), paired with a 10kWh battery backup, not only offers a stylish look but also ensures a quick install. With proven quality and effortless control, furthermore, it includes handy monitoring and update features. Consequently, this plug-and-play system provides peace of mind and instant loadshedding relief. Additionally, The  LuxPower Eco Beast anti-theft function adds an extra layer of security.
short_description: Experience efficient and reliable power management with LuxPower 6Kw Eco Beast All-In-One. Stay connected with real-time monitoring and smart energy usage.

options: Plug and play, peace of mind

name: Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase (LXP-LB12K)
description:
Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase is new design of solar and battery inverter that you can use in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems. 

The LXP Hybrid implements a programmable and scheduled intelligent solar storage system. This power inverter battery can help increase your solar energy self-use and protect your home appliances from grid shortages.

 Power battery inverter can also balance your energy use strategy to save on energy costs

Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Description

Battery Parameters
• Compatible Battery Type: Lead-acid / Lithium
• Nominal Battery Voltage: 48VDC
• Battery Voltage Range: 40VDC-60VDC
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Current: 250A
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Power: 12 000W

DC PV Input
• Max DC Input for Single MPPT: 12 000W / 7 000W / 7 000W
• Maximum PV Input: 18 000W
• DC Input Voltage Range: 100VDC-600VDC
• Nominal DC Input Voltage: 360VDC
• Full Power MPPT Voltage Range: 230VDC-500VDC
• Maximum DC Input Current: 25A / 15A / 15A
• MPPT Number / Strings per MPPT: 3(2/1/1)

AC Output (Grid)
• Nominal Power: 12 000W
• Nominal AC Voltage: 240VAC
• Operating Voltage Range: 180VAC-270VAC
• Maximum Continuous AC Current: 50A @ 240VAC
• Nominal AC Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz

UPS Output (With Battery)
• UPS Max Output Power: 12 000W
• UPS Nominal Output Voltage: 240VAC
• UPS Nominal Output Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz
• UPS Nominal Output Current: 50A @ 240VAC
• Peak Power: 14Kw 10Min / 16Kw 5 Min / 20Kw 500ms
• Switching Time: <20ms

Environment Limit
• Ingress Protection: IP65
• Operating Temperature Range: -25°C to +60°C
• Cooling: Fan
• Communication: RS485 / WIFI / CAN
short_description: Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase is new design of solar and battery inverter that you can use in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems.
